name: Merrell Aurora 6 Ice+ Waterproof Boots - Women's
description: Slick sidewalks have met their match. The Merrell Aurora 6 Ice+ use renowned Arctic Grip soles for unbeatable grip on icy surfaces. Waterproof-breathable construction keeps slush and puddle-water out, for dry warm feet through winter and on into spring.Leather, synthetic and TPU upper.Waterproof-breathable membrane construction.Bellows tongue keeps debris out.M-Select warm, lightweight and low-bulk insulation fends off the cold.EVA contoured footbed with organic odour control.Moulded nylon arch shank.Merrell air cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability.Vibram® Arctic Grip™ outsole with 4.5mm lugs for superior traction on icy surfaces.
